UserCode.Misc
Interface IMouseClickHandler

All Superinterfaces:
IObservable
All Known Implementing Classes:
MouseClickHandler
public interface IMouseClickHandler
extends IObservable

IMouseClickHandler defines an extended interface for an 'Observable' mouse handler. This interface adds a checkMouse() method to the IObservable interface

Version:
3.0
Author:
Chris Williams

Method Summary
abstract  void checkMouse()
          METHOD: this method is used to check if the mouse has been clicked.
abstract  env3d.Env getWorldRef()
          Deprecated. 
 
Methods inherited from interface UserCode.Behaviours.IObservable
addObserver, getObserver, getUpdate, notifyObservers, removeObserver
 

Method Detail

checkMouse

void checkMouse()
METHOD: this method is used to check if the mouse has been clicked. If it has then notify an Observer and pass on the x and y values using the IObservable method getUpdate()
